content.raw:
Both are good ideas:

1. I can not find a way to share content between the ronn which does not imply a local hack. I would like to avoid it and I would say that the number of expected modifications on the man page are not enough to use a local hack.

2. Interesting. I was not able to find any software which automatically from the man page, does the trick. We will need a parser on roff and format and find a reliable way of checking the result. I would say better to think about it outside of the scope of this pull request.
content.html:
Both are good ideas:

  1. I can not find a way to share content between the ronn which does not imply a local hack. I would like to avoid it and I would say that the number of expected modifications on the man page are not enough to use a local hack.

  2. Interesting. I was not able to find any software which automatically from the man page, does the trick. We will need a parser on roff and format and find a reliable way of checking the result. I would say better to think about it outside of the scope of this pull request.
